# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_CAUSES_SWERVING

## Summary
Makes ambient vehicles swerve for this vehicle when head on collisions

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** causesSwerving
